Control Name: 9.2 Ensure web app redirects all HTTP traffic to HTTPS in Azure App Service
Control Statement: Non-secure HTTP requests can be restricted and all HTTP requests redirected to the secure HTTPS port. It is recommended to enforce HTTPS-only traffic.
